mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and green on white) announcing the Louisiana Folk Life Festival featuring Marcia Ball, Nathan and the Zydeco Cha Chas, Rockie Charles and the Staxx of Love, Earl Duke and the Wild Bunch, Swinging Haymakers, Walker Mouton and the Scott Playboys, Kenny Bill Stinson and the Ark-La-Mystics, Kevin Gordon, Judge and the Jury, Po'Henry and Tookie, the Poor Clares, Acoustic Swiftness, Pin Stripe Brass Band, Easter Rock, and the Golden Star Hunters at the Historic Downtown Riverfront in Monroe, Louisiana on September 13 and 14.

subject.topic: Nathan and the Zydeco Cha Chas (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
